summary: REQ-44 and REQ-45 appear implemented in FinalQuestionStep: the NO button no longer has any hover-driven position logic and clicking NO sets the exact new message. REQ-46 is only partially implemented: the checklist confirms the click message but does not explicitly verify that NO no longer moves on hover. Additionally, changes to project_state.json and frontend-file-summaries.txt are not requested by the BuildRequest.

missing_requirements.requirement: Update frontend/DEPLOYMENT_CHECKLIST.md to reflect the new NO button behavior (no movement on hover; on click it shows the updated message).
missing_requirements.reason: The checklist includes verification for the new NO click message, but it does not include a verification item that the NO button does not move on hover (and thus does not fully reflect the new hover behavior requirement).

hallucinated_features.description: Updated/modified project state tracking data (projectStateVersion bumped and summary/features metadata present) unrelated to the requested NO button behavior change.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest only asks to change NO button behavior/copy and update the deployment checklist; it explicitly notes backend unchanged and does not request project state metadata updates.

hallucinated_features.description: Modified repository file summary documentation (frontend-file-summaries.txt) including descriptions of NO button behavior.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest does not request updating internal file summary documentation; only frontend behavior and DEPLOYMENT_CHECKLIST updates are requested.
